p.em: Ya think you'll be less afraid of the dark once you know what's in it? Ah! We'll see… well… you will.

description.p: When you drink this potion, you gain darkvision for up to 30 feet for 8 hours. If you drink this and you already have darkvision, its range is increased by 15 feet. Illusory black circles form around the magic-imbued pine nuts floating in this dark purple liquid to create ephemeral feline irises that stare at the closest living being.
Drinking this potion allows you to benefit from a short rest instantly. The maximum of HD you can spend is equal to half your maximum, rounded down. Your movement speed increase by 10 feet.

When you drink this potion, make a Constitution saving throw. The movement speed increase lasts for a number of minutes equal to three times the result of the saving throw, after which you gain one level of exhaustion, and your movement speed is reduced by 10 feet.
The movement speed reduction lasts until you recover from that level of exhaustion. Drinking more than one of these potions between long rests may have adverse effects.
